name: Paradox Escape Route Hack Trials I DEMO
name_original: Paradox Escape Route Hack Trials I DEMO
description:
This is the 3rd game I've been working on that is a spin off of my upcoming RPG title "Paradox Escape Route." It has a pac-man meets puzzle-maze with room for skill and strategy. This game will also be apart of the 100+ track album I will be releasing with this game that will essentially be included in the full version of this game. 

      With 2 games relatively in the same universe, this will also help me evolve the story and dynamic with new characters as I start to complete next episode once these are finished and up. I am seeking feedback and many play testers as I am constantly combing over this game and finding bugs and inconsistencies that could be sought out and fixed.

Subscribe to my Youtube page for some video's of play-throughs of what I have so far with more to come. I have a lot to implement but things are going pretty smoothly! I've also nearly hit all 999 of my available switches in Smile Game Builder so the ending of this game is encroaching closer that I thought.

If you like what you played, a dollar or $2 would help me purchase a some streaming equipment if any are curious how I make content. Hopefully soon I can fund this myself :)
